title: When you've downloaded a game in match history...
body: You see the prompt that they are available until next patch. Does this mean any saved videos will be lost also? or is there an area where they are saved?

replies.body: I believe that replays are only available to be viewed on the current patch, and no longer accessible after a new one.  We did recently post a[ Replays FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) with that sort of information, but I'm not sure what will happen of them after.  I suggest asking over at the [client boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)to share with the client devs.  Good luck!
